channel.title: SCAR questions
channel.description:
Hey, I haven't been around RuneScape at all the past year.
I might want to run SCAR just for the hell of it. Give my computer something to do while it's on overnight. Maybe even get lucky and make a nice character which might interst me in playing a bit. But I have some questions. I didn't know where else to put it, but if it's in the wrong place, just let a mod move it.
1. Does SCAR use a fake mouse? 2. Can I run multiple characters on SCAR? If so, how much computer resource does one character take? (Don't even know why I'm asking the second question as I've got a high end PC but I'd like to estimate how I could run if I could run multiples) 3. How reliable is SCAR? Can I get a good overnight 8-10 hours straight like Aryan once did? 4. Will virus scans and disk defragments mess SCAR up? (These are schedules overnight on certain days of the week).

item.title: SCAR questions
item.dc:creator: @Starblaster100 Starblaster100
item.description:
@Starblaster100 wrote:

no, it uses your actual mouse
not unless you have a virtual PC
Depends on the script, i have seen 22 hour autoing before.
It will lag your PC, which may muck up some scripts, but it shouldn’t be too bad

Read full topic
